name: Gradianto
description:
About
Gradianto aims to be easy on the eyes while being colorful and bright. Gradianto ships with the gradients found in nature. There is something for everyone.

Getting started

Download the jar file open IntelliJ and go to plugins > install from disk > select the jar restart IDE and you are set. Alternatively, you may download it using the plugins tab in IntelliJ. It is recommended to restart the IDE after changing the theme.
